TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWebPartField

summary.span: 定义使用单个字段数据连接两个服务器控件的提供者接口。

span.span: Defines a provider interface for connecting two server controls using a single field of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口是用于与 Web 部件连接而设计的。This interface is designed to be used with Web Parts connections. 在 Web 部件连接中，两个服务器控件位于区域建立数据连接和共享数据，使用一个控件作为使用者和充当一个提供程序的其他控件。In a Web Parts connection, two server controls that reside in a zone establish a connection and share data, with one control acting as the consumer and the other control acting as a provider. 用于共享 Web 部件连接中的数据的机制是提供者提供向使用者通过使用回调方法的接口实例。The mechanism for sharing data in a Web Parts connection is an interface instance, which the provider serves to the consumer by means of a callback method. 若要建立连接，使用者和提供程序必须同时使用相同的接口类型的共享数据。To establish a connection, the consumer and provider must both work with the same interface type for sharing data. 如果使用者无法识别提供程序发送的接口类型，则仍可以通过转换器连接控件 (对象) 转换为类型提供程序发送的接口实例的使用者识别。If the consumer does not recognize the interface type sent by the provider, it is still possible to connect the controls by means of a transformer (a object) that translates the interface instance sent by the provider into a type that the consumer recognizes. 有关连接的详细信息，请参阅并[Web 部件连接概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b)。For details on connections, see and [Web Parts Connections Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b). 接口是附带的 Web 部件控件集用作用于创建基于数据字段的连接的标准接口的提供程序接口。The interface is a provider interface included with the Web Parts control set as a standard interface for creating connections based on a data field. 此外可以创建自定义的接口来使用 Web 部件连接，但在许多数据驱动 Web 应用程序，最好先创建基于共同的行的连接 (有关详细信息，请参阅接口)，表 (有关详细信息，请参阅接口），或字段从数据源，使用接口。You can also create custom interfaces to use with Web Parts connections, but in many data-driven Web applications, it is useful to create connections based on a common row (for details, see the interface), table (for details, see the interface), or field from the data source, using the interface. 在典型的连接中，控制操作，如提供程序会实现接口，并为特殊的回调方法中的使用者提供接口的实例。In a typical connection, a control acting as a provider would implement the interface and provide an instance of the interface to consumers in a special callback method. 例如，提供程序可能会实施界面包含 Web 用户的邮政编码数据在用户的信息表中的字段。For example, the provider might implement an interface for a field in your user information table that contains a Web user's postal code data. 另一个控制操作，如使用者将定义用于接收接口实例，无法提取邮政编码数据，并查找并显示基于邮政编码的天气信息的特殊方法。Another control acting as a consumer would define a special method to receive the interface instance, and could then extract the postal code data, and look up and display weather information based on the postal code. 接口有两个公开的成员。The interface has two exposed members. 属性将返回有关在中封装的数据字段的架构信息对象。The property returns schema information about the data field encapsulated in a object. 方法声明 （如提供程序控件） 的实现器用来检索接口实例的字段数据时调用回调方法的方法。The method declares a method that an implementer (such as a provider control) uses to retrieve the interface instance's field data when the callback method is invoked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用两个控件之间的静态连接接口。The following code example demonstrates how to create a static connection between two controls using the interface. 代码示例包含三个部分：The code example has three parts: - 两个自定义的源代码可以形成连接使用的控件接口，其中一个控件作为提供程序，另一个充当使用者。Source code for two custom controls that can form a connection using the interface, with one control acting as the provider, the other acting as the consumer. - 承载的控件和声明中的持久性格式的静态连接的网页。A Web page that hosts the controls and declares the static connection in persistence format. - 在示例代码运行时，会发生什么情况的说明。A description of what happens when the example code runs. 代码示例的第一部分是两个自定义控件的源代码。The first part of the code example is the source code for the two custom controls. 首先是实现的提供程序的代码接口。First is the code for the provider, which implements the interface. 为简单起见，在示例中，提供程序使用一些数据，而无需连接到数据库中创建一个表。For simplicity in the example, the provider creates a table with some data rather than connecting to a database. `GetConnectionInterface`方法用作提供者连接点，接口实例返回给使用者的回调方法。The `GetConnectionInterface` method serves as the provider's connection point, the callback method that returns the interface instance to the consumer. 它可以与使用者，来检索从名为其方法中的提供程序接口实例`SetConnectionInterface`，这将标有`ConnectionConsumer`属性。As for the consumer, it retrieves the interface instance from the provider in its method named `SetConnectionInterface`, which is marked with a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute. 在检索接口的使用者，实例后其`OnPreRender`方法，调用的实现中的提供程序，以检索实际数据的方法。After retrieving the instance of the interface, the consumer, in its `OnPreRender` method, calls the implementation of the method in the provider, to retrieve the actual data. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview/CS/IFieldSample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview/VB/IFieldSample.vb#2)] 代码示例的第二部分是声明静态连接和主机控件的网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page that declares the static connection and hosts the controls. 页面顶部附近是`Register`声明包含在 App_Code 目录中的源代码的命名空间的指令。Near the top of the page is a `Register` directive that declares the namespace of the source code contained in the App_Code directory. 使用声明连接``元素。The connection is declared using an `` element. 自定义的使用者和提供者控件中声明``中的元素``元素中，所需的用户能够连接 (两者必须驻留在继承自一个区域内类)。The custom consumer and provider controls are declared in a `` element within an `` element, which is required for them to be able to connect (they must reside within a zone that inherits from the class). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview/VB/Defaultvb.aspx#1)] 在浏览器页面加载。Load the page in a browser. 使用者控件显示从指定的字段，提供程序提供的实例通过提供的数据接口。The consumer control displays the data provided from the specified field, which the provider makes available through an instance of the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetFieldValue(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.FieldCallback callback) cil managed

param.name: callback
param.span: 一个 委托，包含接收数据的方法的地址。

span.span: A delegate that contains the address of a method that receives the data.

summary.span: 返回字段的值，该字段由接口用作两个 控件之间的连接基础。

span.span: Returns the value of the field that is being used by the interface as the basis of a connection between two controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可检索由接口传递的数据字段值。Use this method to retrieve the data field values passed by the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了实现和利用方法。The following code example shows the implementation and use of the method. 完整的示例所示的类概述接口。The complete example is shown in the class overview for the interface. 提供者控件实现方法，并在数据表中返回的特定字段的值。The provider control implements the method, returning the value of a particular field in the data table. 使用者控件调用中的方法及其`OnPreRender`方法，以便此数据的值可以写入页。The consumer control calls the method in its `OnPreRender` method, so that the value of the data can be written to the page. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview/CS/IFieldSample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview/VB/IFieldSample.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Schema As PropertyDescriptor

summary.span: 获取用于在两个 控件之间共享数据的数据字段的架构信息。

span.span: Gets the schema information for a data field that is used to share data between two controls.

value.span: ，描述该数据字段的架构信息。

span.span: A that describes the schema information for the data field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供了接口所传递的数据的属性信息。This property provides property information for the data passed by the interface. 转换器和使用者控件可以查询此属性以获取信息的类型的内容，并且该字段的其他详细信息包含在接口实例发送的提供程序。Transformer and consumer controls can query this property to get information about the type, contents, and other details of the field contained in the interface instance sent by a provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了实现和利用属性。The following code example shows the implementation and use of the property. 完整的示例所示的类概述接口。The complete example is shown in the class overview for the interface. 提供者控件实现属性。The provider control implements the property. 然后，在其`GetFieldValue`方法，它使用属性来检索字段值。Then, in its `GetFieldValue` method, it uses the property to retrieve the field value. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview/CS/IFieldSample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartField_Overview/VB/IFieldSample.vb#2)]
